comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:9.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/9.0
Build ID: 20111122192043

Steps to reproduce:

1. Install the firefox open web apps extension (http://people.mozilla.com/~dclarke/openwebapps/Extension/)
2. Go to https://apps-preview-dev.allizom.org/en-US/apps/ and install an application
3. Go to https://myapps.mozillalabs.com/ and right click the installed application


Actual results:

The application began executing (e.g. for barfight, this would be going to the tubagames.net page showing the web gl games).


Expected results:

A context menu should appear for the application selected allowing operations such as deletion.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Install the firefox open web apps extension (http://people.mozilla.com/~dclarke/openwebapps/Extension/)
2. Go to https://apps-preview-dev.allizom.org/en-US/apps/ and install an application
3. Go to https://myapps.mozillalabs.com/ and right click the installed application

Expected results:

A context menu should appear for the application selected allowing operations such as deletion.
